title: Cubus
author: Cubus
content: Dear Bitcointalk Community!ZenPulsar is here offering an outstanding offer for the real Crypto-enthusiasts.ZenPulsar is a groundbreaking AI training platform with an increadible potential. But without a community like you, we are unable to develop further. ZenPulsar hires crypto experts to train our AI recognition of Crypto Tweets. Those who speak following languages are urgently needed:- Japanese- Italian- Spanish- French- Arabic- Portuguese- Polish- Tagalog- Turkish- KoreanThe task contains these activities: • To look through the database of tweets on our platform • To mark them as relevant or irrelevant Those who apply for this task will have an access to our community trainings and will be generously rewarded!If you are interested and have a fluent/native command of one of these languages, please fill this form below:https://forms.gle/xNhEGhUBCahf4idi6Please reply in comments after you have completed the form so we could contact you quicker
